summary: Control git by performing various operations like cloning repositories, committing files, pushing changes, and more.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: The way to authenticate. Choose between using Git password or no authentication.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform such as adding files, committing changes, cloning repositories, pushing changes, and more.

parameters.name: repository path
parameters.description: Local path of the git repository to operate on. Required for most operations except cloning.

parameters.name: new repository path
parameters.description: Local path to which the git repository should be cloned into. Required for the 'clone' operation.

parameters.name: paths to add
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of paths of files or folders to add. Required for the 'add' operation.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Name of the key to set. Required for the 'addConfig' operation.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value of the key to set. Required for the 'addConfig' operation.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the 'addConfig' operation like setting mode to append or set.

parameters.name: source repository
parameters.description: The URL or path of the repository to clone. Required for the 'clone' operation.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The commit message to use. Required for the 'commit' operation.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the 'commit' operation like specifying paths to commit.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit. Required for the 'log' operation.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results to return. Required for the 'log' operation if 'return all' is set to false.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the 'log' operation like specifying the file to get the history of.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the 'push' operation like specifying the target repository to push to.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the tag to create. Required for the 'tag' operation.
